column4: http://paste.ubuntu.com/545226/   <- trying to run ./configure on the entangle-0.2.0 source. Anyone with a clue?
well it's pretty self-explanatory. "Package 'hal' not found"
it is installed, it's version 0.54-ubuntu
Do read even below-"you may set the environment variables...."
well... there's my question... what should I set those variables to?
PKG_CONFIG_PATH i guess.
neither do I :). maybe you should check the forums.
forums of entangle that is.
entangle also has an IRC channel #entangle on OFTC.
you joined #entangle on OFTC and you became OP?
wow! now that is surprising.
you tell me :D
well i have no clue; lemme check.
maybe somebody could help. i don't know :).
thanks for looking with me :D  ... I just wanted to join their mailing list... and got the developer's email address... I'll mail with him :)
could you try install libhal-dev and try?
good idea, trying it right away :)
thanks... That got me an item further :D
np :)
neither did I. just google suggested trying that :)
what search terms did you use?
just searched for the error shown "Package requirements (hal >= 0.5.0) were not met:" :)
anyway thanks alot
